ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] ugh, shutting bards out of lotto getting more wides pread
ygData.messageBody:
Yes what guild and server?

--- "Webber, Jessica" <webber@...> wrote:
> I think you should find a new guild, but make sure
> any close friends you
> have in the guild know why you're leaving.
>
> What server/guild is this anyway?
>
> Peace
> Evulia, bard of 10 songs, Tunare
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Jeff Heskett [mailto:tarkin@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2000 11:09 PM
> > To: eqbards@egroups.com
> > Subject: [eqbards] ugh, shutting bards out of
> lotto getting more
> > widespread
> >
> >
> > tonight i found out that no longer will bards in
> our guild be
> > allowed on
> > lotto for haste items, ever. (unless it's
> bard-only)
> >
> > 2 cloak of flames dropped off nagafen last time (i
> wasn't there or i
> > would've known about this sooner) and bards were
> excluded in
> > the lotto. no
> > more runed bolster belts will be going to bards
> either.
> > (fbss only likely
> > one now, and only then if no other guild members
> that need it
> > are in group
> > according to guild rules)
> >
> > i need some pursuasive arguments to back me up.
> this is a
> > guild of 150+
> > different players. (tho minus a few bards lately)
> >
> > i tried a few arguments mentioned on this list,
> but the
> > leaders of the guild
> > are pretty sure that since bards have haste songs,
> they don't
> > need a haste
> > item. (even tho they stack) being a huge guild,
> the leaders
> > get whines and
> > rants all the time, so our chances of convincing
> them
> > otherwise is very
> > slim.
> >
> > any ideas?
> >
> >
> >
>
